title: Tech Stocks Stumble, Small Caps Jump As Rotation Gathers Pace
description: Investors swapped technology high-flyers for last year’s laggards on Thursday, resuming an intermittent rotation that has characterized US equity trading in early 2026.
content: Investors swapped technology high-flyers for last year’s laggards on Thursday, resuming an intermittent rotation that has characterized US equity trading in early 2026.
